typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		Attr1 as string,
		Attr2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: ($modifiedAfter),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'SrcEntOne.cdm.json/SrcEntOne',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'SrcEntOne',
	corpusPath: 'logical',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 't1automationsource',
	folderPath: 'physical/SrcEntOne',
	fileSystem: 't1automationsource') ~> SrcEntOneDeltaSource
source(output(
		Attr3 as string,
		Attr2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: 'SrcEntTwo.cdm.json/SrcEntTwo',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'SrcEntTwo',
	corpusPath: 'logical',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 't1automationsource',
	folderPath: 'physical/SrcEntTwo',
	fileSystem: 't1automationsource') ~> SrcEntTwoSource
SrcEntOneDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		Attr1,
		Attr2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SrcEntOne
SrcEntTwoSource select(mapColumn(
		Attr3,
		Attr2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SrcEntTwo
SrcEntOne, SrcEntTwo join(SrcEntOne@Attr2 == SrcEntTwo@Attr2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSrcEntTwo
JoinSrcEntTwo select(mapColumn(
		Attr1,
		Attr2 = SrcEntOne@Attr2,
		Attr3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TarEntOne
TarEntOne sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'TarEntOne.cdm.json/TarEntOne',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'TarEntOne',
	folderPath: 'physical/TarEntOne',
	fileSystem: 't1automationtarget',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: 'logical',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 't1automationtarget',
	truncate: false) ~> TarEntOneSink
